numlitem.para: Manual braking capability on alternate brake system is verified on associated wheels, and
If normal braking system is lost and alternate brakes will be used, use manual braking techniques.

placard.para: Placard ANTI-SKID Light "ALT ANTI-SKID VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify that manual braking capability is available on affected wheels as follows:
Depress and release brake pedals. Observe brake unit wear indicator pins to check that all brakes apply and release.
If brakes apply and release on all brakes, manual braking capability on the alternate brake system is verified and dispatch is allowed without further maintenance action.
If manual braking is not available on all brakes, use the following procedure:
Deactivate alternate anti-skid valve(s) for affected brakes.
Disconnect and stow connector for affected alternate anti-skid valve (see illustration).
Depress and release brake pedals. Observe brake unit wear indicator pins to check that all brakes apply and release.
If brakes apply and release on all brakes, manual braking capability on the alternate brake system is verified and dispatch is allowed with no AFM performance penalties.

sheet.title: LEFT WHEEL WELL SHOWN RIGHT WHEEL WELL OPPOSITE
